Los porcentajes bajos de asistencia pued: The low attendance percentages may be due to different factors, we list the most common ones so that, depending on this, the campaigns with low attendance returns are analyzed and the necessary actions are taken to correct them. 1) Reminders were not sent, or sent late. 2) The assistance in the AC System was not registered, that is, the QR code of the voucher was not read, nor was the list of assistance of the system used to register the assistants. 3) Unfavorable weather conditions on the day of the event. 4) The event has been held in a place of difficult access or not appropriate for mass assistance
Es muy importante que a toda persona que: It is very important that every person who has confirmed their attendance is sent the reminder message for the following classes, the person usually does not have the course incorporated into their routine, does not remember many times that they should attend the next class, so It is very important that the person in charge of registration sends to all confirmed persons a reminder after the start of the courses. A possible solution to this is to review the campaigns that have had a low percentage of reminder sending to the next class, and ask the enrollment officer not to neglect this action in future registrations.
El porcentaje de confirmación esta por d: The confirmation percentage is below 70%, this may be because you are not contacting the registered people quickly, remember that the recommendation is to do it within 2 or 3 hours after registration. Your current confirmation percentage is
No deben quedar recordatorios sin enviar: There should be no reminders left without sending, this greatly reduces the number of people attending
